miic.core.stretch_mod.multi_ref_creation¶

multi_ref_creation(corr_mat, rtime, freq=30, use_break_point=False, break_point=None)[source]¶

Create the multi-reference traces

This function creates multi-reference traces according with the given frequency. In case of a break-point is passed, the intervals to consider for the reference traces creation are symmetric respect to it.

Parameters:
  • corr_mat (ndarray) – Correlation matrix with one correlation function on each row
  • rtime (array of datetime objects) – Time vector associated to the given correlation matrix. Its lenght must be equal to the numer of columns of the corr_mat parameter
  • freq (int) – One reference trace every freq days
  • use_break_point (bool) – If True the reference traces are calculated in different intervals of freq days symmetric respect to the break_point
  • break_point (string) – Brake point expressed as “YYYY-MM-DD”
